verbs.description: Alice Johnson [V: was] freed from federal prison on Wednesday , after having her life drug sentence commuted by President Trump .
[ARG1: Alice Johnson] was [V: freed] [ARG2: from federal prison] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] , [ARGM-TMP: after having her life drug sentence commuted by President Trump] .
[ARG0: Alice Johnson] was freed from federal prison on Wednesday , after [V: having] [ARG1: her life drug sentence commuted by President Trump] .
Alice Johnson was freed from federal prison on Wednesday , after having [ARG1: her life drug sentence] [V: commuted] [ARG0: by President Trump] .
